extension.analogClock.size.description: Change the clock size. The default value is `Small`.
extension.analogClock.backgroundColor.de: Set the background color in HEX format. The default value is `#3498db`.
extension.analogClock.backgroundColor.er: Invalid format! Please enter a color in HEX format, starting with #, followed by 1 to 8 hexadecimal characters (0-9, A-F). Example: #f, #ff5733, or #ff5733cc.
